00034 /*
00035  * Default rrdtool graph definitions
00036  */
00037 
00038 function get_template(&$vars) {
00039     if ($vars->defp('rrdfile0')) {
00040     return get_combined_template($vars);
00041     } else {
00042     if (!$vars->defp('rrdtype')) {
00043         if (isset($symon['graph_debug'])) {
00044         warning('graph: cannot load graph template; rrdtype not set');
00045         }
00046     } else {
00047         return get_single_template($vars->get('rrdtype'));
00048     }
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 function get_single_template($graph_type) {
00053     global $symon;
00054 
00055     switch (strtolower($graph_type)) {
00056     case "cpu0":
00057     case "cpu1":
00058     case "cpu2":
00059     case "cpu3":
00060     return '
00061 -u 100
00062 --rigid
00063 -v % cpu
00064 -t %title%
00065 -w %width%
00066 -h %heigth%
00067 -s %start%
00068 -e %end%
00069 DEF:A=%rrdfile%:user:AVERAGE
00070 DEF:B=%rrdfile%:nice:AVERAGE
00071 DEF:C=%rrdfile%:system:AVERAGE
00072 DEF:D=%rrdfile%:interrupt:AVERAGE
00073 DEF:E=%rrdfile%:idle:AVERAGE
00074 CDEF:nodata=A,UN,0,*
00075 COMMENT:                 min       avg       max       last\n
00076 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00077 AREA:A#00FF00:user     
00078 GPRINT:A:MIN: %6.2lf %%
00079 GPRINT:A:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %%
00080 GPRINT:A:MAX:%6.2lf %%
00081 GPRINT:A:LAST:%6.2lf %%\n
00082 STACK:B#00FFFF:nice     
00083 GPRINT:B:MIN: %6.2lf %%
00084 GPRINT:B:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %%
00085 GPRINT:B:MAX:%6.2lf %%
00086 GPRINT:B:LAST:%6.2lf %%\n
00087 STACK:C#DDA0DD:system   
00088 GPRINT:C:MIN: %6.2lf %%
00089 GPRINT:C:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %%
00090 GPRINT:C:MAX:%6.2lf %%
00091 GPRINT:C:LAST:%6.2lf %%\n
00092 STACK:D#9932CC:interrupt
00093 GPRINT:D:MIN: %6.2lf %%
00094 GPRINT:D:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %%
00095 GPRINT:D:MAX:%6.2lf %%
00096 GPRINT:D:LAST:%6.2lf %%\n
00097 STACK:E#F5FFFA:idle     
00098 GPRINT:E:MIN: %6.2lf %%
00099 GPRINT:E:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %%
00100 GPRINT:E:MAX:%6.2lf %%
00101 GPRINT:E:LAST:%6.2lf %%\n
00102 ';
00103     break;
00104 
00105     case 'io1':
00106     return '
00107 -v bytes/s
00108 -t %title%
00109 -w %width%
00110 -h %heigth%
00111 -s %start%
00112 -e %end%
00113 DEF:A=%rrdfile%:transfers:AVERAGE
00114 DEF:B=%rrdfile%:seeks:AVERAGE
00115 DEF:C=%rrdfile%:bytes:AVERAGE
00116 CDEF:nodata=A,UN,0,*
00117 COMMENT:               min          avg          max          last\n
00118 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00119 AREA:C#00FF00:bytes    
00120 GPRINT:C:MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00121 GPRINT:C:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00122 GPRINT:C:MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00123 GPRINT:C:LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00124 LINE1:B#0000FF:seeks    
00125 GPRINT:B:MIN:%6.2lf     
00126 GPRINT:B:AVERAGE:%6.2lf     
00127 GPRINT:B:MAX:%6.2lf     
00128 GPRINT:B:LAST:%6.2lf\n
00129 LINE1:A#FFF000:transfers
00130 GPRINT:A:MIN:%6.2lf     
00131 GPRINT:A:AVERAGE:%6.2lf     
00132 GPRINT:A:MAX:%6.2lf     
00133 GPRINT:A:LAST:%6.2lf\n
00134 ';
00135     break;
00136 
00137     case 'io':
00138     return '
00139 -v bytes/s
00140 -t %title%
00141 -w %width%
00142 -h %heigth%
00143 -s %start%
00144 -e %end%
00145 DEF:rx=%rrdfile%:rxfer:AVERAGE
00146 DEF:wx=%rrdfile%:wxfer:AVERAGE
00147 DEF:seeks=%rrdfile%:seeks:AVERAGE
00148 DEF:rb=%rrdfile%:rbytes:AVERAGE
00149 DEF:wb=%rrdfile%:wbytes:AVERAGE
00150 CDEF:nwb=wb,-1,*
00151 CDEF:nwx=wx,-1,*
00152 CDEF:nodata=rx,UN,0,*
00153 COMMENT:               min          avg          max          last\n
00154 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00155 
00156 AREA:rb#00FF00:rbytes   
00157 GPRINT:rb:MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00158 GPRINT:rb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00159 GPRINT:rb:MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00160 GPRINT:rb:LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00161 LINE1:rx#9932CC:rxfer    
00162 GPRINT:rx:MIN:%6.2lf     
00163 GPRINT:rx:AVERAGE:%6.2lf     
00164 GPRINT:rx:MAX:%6.2lf     
00165 GPRINT:rx:LAST:%6.2lf\n
00166 AREA:nwb#00FFFF:wbytes   
00167 GPRINT:wb:MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00168 GPRINT:wb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00169 GPRINT:wb:MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00170 GPRINT:wb:LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00171 LINE1:nwx#DDA0DD:wxfer    
00172 GPRINT:wx:MIN:%6.2lf     
00173 GPRINT:wx:AVERAGE:%6.2lf     
00174 GPRINT:wx:MAX:%6.2lf     
00175 GPRINT:wx:LAST:%6.2lf\n
00176 LINE1:seeks#F5FFFA:seeks    
00177 GPRINT:seeks:MIN:%6.2lf     
00178 GPRINT:seeks:AVERAGE:%6.2lf     
00179 GPRINT:seeks:MAX:%6.2lf     
00180 GPRINT:seeks:LAST:%6.2lf\n
00181 ';
00182     break;
00183 
00184     case 'if':
00185     return '
00186 -v bits/s
00187 -t %title%
00188 -w %width%
00189 -h %heigth%
00190 -s %start%
00191 -e %end%
00192 DEF:in=%rrdfile%:ibytes:AVERAGE
00193 DEF:out=%rrdfile%:obytes:AVERAGE
00194 DEF:inp=%rrdfile%:ipackets:AVERAGE
00195 DEF:outp=%rrdfile%:opackets:AVERAGE
00196 DEF:coll=%rrdfile%:collisions:AVERAGE
00197 CDEF:nodata=in,UN,0,*
00198 CDEF:inb=in,8,*
00199 CDEF:outb=out,8,*
00200 CDEF:noutb=outb,-1,*
00201 CDEF:pmax=inb,100,/,102,*
00202 CDEF:nmax=noutb,100,/,102,*
00203 CDEF:totp=inp,outp,+
00204 CDEF:per=coll,totp,/,100,*
00205 CDEF:p0=per,0,EQ,INF,0,IF
00206 CDEF:p10=per,10,LE,INF,0,IF,per,1,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00207 CDEF:p20=per,20,LE,INF,0,IF,per,10,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00208 CDEF:p30=per,30,LE,INF,0,IF,per,20,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00209 CDEF:p40=per,40,LE,INF,0,IF,per,30,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00210 CDEF:p50=per,50,LE,INF,0,IF,per,40,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00211 CDEF:p60=per,60,LE,INF,0,IF,per,50,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00212 CDEF:p70=per,70,LE,INF,0,IF,per,60,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00213 CDEF:p80=per,80,LE,INF,0,IF,per,70,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00214 CDEF:p90=per,80,LE,INF,0,IF,per,80,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00215 CDEF:p100=per,100,LE,INF,0,IF,per,90,GT,INF,0,IF,MIN
00216 CDEF:n0=p0,-1,*
00217 CDEF:n10=p10,-1,*
00218 CDEF:n20=p20,-1,*
00219 CDEF:n30=p30,-1,*
00220 CDEF:n40=p40,-1,*
00221 CDEF:n50=p50,-1,*
00222 CDEF:n60=p60,-1,*
00223 CDEF:n70=p70,-1,*
00224 CDEF:n80=p80,-1,*
00225 CDEF:n90=p90,-1,*
00226 CDEF:n100=p100,-1,*
00227 LINE1:pmax
00228 LINE1:nmax
00229 COMMENT:              min           avg          max          last\n
00230 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00231 AREA:inb#00FF00:in     
00232 GPRINT:inb:MIN: %6.2lf %sbps
00233 GPRINT:inb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00234 GPRINT:inb:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00235 GPRINT:inb:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00236 STACK:p0#FAFFFA
00237 STACK:p10#FFFFE6
00238 STACK:p20#FFD900
00239 STACK:p30#FD6724
00240 STACK:p40#E61800
00241 STACK:p50#AB2934
00242 STACK:p60#B2888B
00243 STACK:p70#CC91BA
00244 STACK:p80#6A2990
00245 STACK:p90#0571B0
00246 STACK:p100#000000
00247 AREA:noutb#00FFFF:out     
00248 GPRINT:outb:MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00249 GPRINT:outb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00250 GPRINT:outb:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00251 GPRINT:outb:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00252 COMMENT:packetloss
00253 GPRINT:per:MIN:%6.2lf%%    
00254 GPRINT:per:AVERAGE:%6.2lf%%    
00255 GPRINT:per:MAX:%6.2lf%%    
00256 GPRINT:per:LAST:%6.2lf%%\n
00257 STACK:n0#FFFFFF: = 0%
00258 STACK:n10#F0E0E0: <10%
00259 STACK:n20#FFD900: <20%
00260 STACK:n30#FD6724: <30%
00261 STACK:n40#E61800: <40%
00262 STACK:n50#AB2934: <50%\n
00263 STACK:n60#B2888B: <60%
00264 STACK:n70#CC91BA: <70%
00265 STACK:n80#6A2990: <80%
00266 STACK:n90#0571B0: <90%
00267 STACK:n100#000000: <100%
00268 ';
00269     break;
00270 
00271     case 'mem':
00272     return '
00273 -v bytes
00274 -b 1024
00275 -t %title%
00276 -w %width%
00277 -h %heigth%
00278 -s %start%
00279 -e %end%
00280 DEF:A=%rrdfile%:real_active:AVERAGE
00281 DEF:B=%rrdfile%:real_total:AVERAGE
00282 DEF:C=%rrdfile%:free:AVERAGE
00283 DEF:D=%rrdfile%:swap_used:AVERAGE
00284 DEF:E=%rrdfile%:swap_total:AVERAGE
00285 CDEF:nodata=A,UN,0,*
00286 COMMENT:                  min        avg        max        last\n
00287 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00288 AREA:B#008B8B:real      
00289 GPRINT:B:MIN: %6.2lf %sb
00290 GPRINT:B:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sb
00291 GPRINT:B:MAX:%6.2lf %sb
00292 GPRINT:B:LAST:%6.2lf %sb\n
00293 STACK:C#3CB371:free      
00294 GPRINT:C:MIN: %6.2lf %sb
00295 GPRINT:C:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sb
00296 GPRINT:C:MAX:%6.2lf %sb
00297 GPRINT:C:LAST:%6.2lf %sb\n
00298 LINE1:A#00FFFF:active    
00299 GPRINT:A:MIN: %6.2lf %sb
00300 GPRINT:A:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sb
00301 GPRINT:A:MAX:%6.2lf %sb
00302 GPRINT:A:LAST:%6.2lf %sb\n
00303 LINE1:D#888C00:swap used 
00304 GPRINT:D:MIN: %6.2lf %sb
00305 GPRINT:D:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sb
00306 GPRINT:D:MAX:%6.2lf %sb
00307 GPRINT:D:LAST:%6.2lf %sb\n
00308 LINE2:E#FF8C00:swap total
00309 GPRINT:E:MIN: %6.2lf %sb
00310 GPRINT:E:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sb
00311 GPRINT:E:MAX:%6.2lf %sb
00312 GPRINT:E:LAST:%6.2lf %sb\n
00313 ';
00314     break;
00315 
00316     case 'pf':
00317     return '
00318 -t %title%
00319 -v bits/s
00320 -w %width%
00321 -h %heigth%
00322 -s %start%
00323 -e %end%
00324 DEF:A=%rrdfile%:bytes_v4_in:AVERAGE
00325 DEF:B=%rrdfile%:bytes_v4_out:AVERAGE
00326 DEF:C=%rrdfile%:bytes_v6_in:AVERAGE
00327 DEF:D=%rrdfile%:bytes_v6_out:AVERAGE
00328 CDEF:inb=A,C,+,8,*
00329 CDEF:outb=B,D,+,8,*
00330 CDEF:nodata=A,UN,0,*
00331 COMMENT:                min          avg          max          last\n
00332 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00333 AREA:inb#00FF00:incoming
00334 GPRINT:inb:MIN: %6.2lf %sbps
00335 GPRINT:inb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00336 GPRINT:inb:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00337 GPRINT:inb:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00338 LINE1:outb#00FFFF:outgoing 
00339 GPRINT:outb:MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00340 GPRINT:outb:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00341 GPRINT:outb:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00342 GPRINT:outb:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00343 ';
00344     break;
00345 
00346     case 'pfq':
00347     return '
00348 -t %title%
00349 -v bits/s
00350 -w %width%
00351 -h %heigth%
00352 -s %start%
00353 -e %end%
00354 DEF:A=%rrdfile%:sent_bytes:AVERAGE
00355 DEF:B=%rrdfile%:drop_bytes:AVERAGE
00356 CDEF:sent=A,8,*
00357 CDEF:dropped=B,8,*
00358 CDEF:ndropped=dropped,-1,*
00359 CDEF:nodata=A,UN,0,*
00360 COMMENT:                min          avg          max          last\n
00361 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00362 AREA:sent#00FF00:sent    
00363 GPRINT:sent:MIN: %6.2lf %sbps
00364 GPRINT:sent:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00365 GPRINT:sent:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00366 GPRINT:sent:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00367 AREA:ndropped#00FFFF:dropped  
00368 GPRINT:dropped:MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00369 GPRINT:dropped:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00370 GPRINT:dropped:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00371 GPRINT:dropped:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00372 ';
00373     break;
00374 
00375     case 'proc':
00376     return '
00377 -t %title%
00378 -v ticks/s
00379 -w %width%
00380 -h %heigth%
00381 -s %start%
00382 -e %end%
00383 DEF:number=%rrdfile%:number:AVERAGE
00384 DEF:uticks=%rrdfile%:uticks:AVERAGE
00385 DEF:sticks=%rrdfile%:sticks:AVERAGE
00386 DEF:iticks=%rrdfile%:iticks:AVERAGE
00387 DEF:cpusec=%rrdfile%:cpusec:AVERAGE
00388 DEF:procsz=%rrdfile%:procsz:AVERAGE
00389 DEF:rsssz=%rrdfile%:rsssz:AVERAGE
00390 CDEF:null=number,number,-
00391 CDEF:iprocsz=0,procsz,-
00392 CDEF:irsssz=0,rsssz,-
00393 CDEF:nodata=number,UN,0,*
00394 COMMENT:             min       avg       max       last\n
00395 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00396 AREA:number#0000FF:number
00397 GPRINT:number:MIN:%6.2lf  
00398 GPRINT:number:AVERAGE:%6.2lf  
00399 GPRINT:number:MAX:%6.2lf  
00400 GPRINT:number:LAST:%6.2lf \n
00401 AREA:uticks#00FF00:uticks
00402 GPRINT:uticks:MIN:%6.2lf %s
00403 GPRINT:uticks:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00404 GPRINT:uticks:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00405 GPRINT:uticks:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00406 STACK:sticks#DDA0DD:sticks
00407 GPRINT:sticks:MIN:%6.2lf %s
00408 GPRINT:sticks:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00409 GPRINT:sticks:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00410 GPRINT:sticks:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00411 STACK:iticks#9932CC:iticks
00412 GPRINT:iticks:MIN:%6.2lf %s
00413 GPRINT:iticks:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00414 GPRINT:iticks:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00415 GPRINT:iticks:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00416 COMMENT: cpusec
00417 GPRINT:cpusec:MIN: %6.2lf %s
00418 GPRINT:cpusec:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00419 GPRINT:cpusec:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00420 GPRINT:cpusec:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00421 COMMENT: procsz
00422 GPRINT:procsz:MIN: %6.2lf %s
00423 GPRINT:procsz:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00424 GPRINT:procsz:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00425 GPRINT:procsz:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00426 COMMENT: rsssz
00427 GPRINT:rsssz:MIN:  %6.2lf %s
00428 GPRINT:rsssz:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00429 GPRINT:rsssz:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00430 GPRINT:rsssz:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00431 ';
00432     case 'mbuf':
00433     return '
00434 -t %title%
00435 -w %width%
00436 -h %heigth%
00437 -s %start%
00438 -e %end%
00439 DEF:totmbufs=%rrdfile%:totmbufs:AVERAGE
00440 DEF:mt_data=%rrdfile%:mt_data:AVERAGE
00441 DEF:mt_oobdata=%rrdfile%:mt_oobdata:AVERAGE
00442 DEF:mt_control=%rrdfile%:mt_control:AVERAGE
00443 DEF:mt_header=%rrdfile%:mt_header:AVERAGE
00444 DEF:mt_ftable=%rrdfile%:mt_ftable:AVERAGE
00445 DEF:mt_soname=%rrdfile%:mt_soname:AVERAGE
00446 DEF:mt_soopts=%rrdfile%:mt_soopts:AVERAGE
00447 DEF:pgused=%rrdfile%:pgused:AVERAGE
00448 DEF:pgtotal=%rrdfile%:pgtotal:AVERAGE
00449 DEF:totmem=%rrdfile%:totmem:AVERAGE
00450 DEF:totpct=%rrdfile%:totpct:AVERAGE
00451 DEF:m_drops=%rrdfile%:m_drops:AVERAGE
00452 DEF:m_wait=%rrdfile%:m_wait:AVERAGE
00453 DEF:m_drain=%rrdfile%:m_drain:AVERAGE
00454 CDEF:nodata=totmbufs,UN,0,*
00455 COMMENT:                   min       avg       max       last\n
00456 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00457 AREA:mt_data#00FF00:mt_data   
00458 GPRINT:mt_data:MIN:  %6.2lf %s
00459 GPRINT:mt_data:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00460 GPRINT:mt_data:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00461 GPRINT:mt_data:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00462 STACK:mt_oobdata#888C00:mt_oobdata
00463 GPRINT:mt_oobdata:MIN:  %6.2lf %s
00464 GPRINT:mt_oobdata:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00465 GPRINT:mt_oobdata:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00466 GPRINT:mt_oobdata:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00467 STACK:mt_control#FF8C00:mt_control

00501 GPRINT:m_drops:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n

00504 GPRINT:m_drain:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00505 GPRINT:m_drain:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00506 GPRINT:m_drain:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00507 LINE1:m_wait#0000ff:m_wait    
00508 GPRINT:m_wait:MIN:  %6.2lf %s
00509 GPRINT:m_wait:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %s
00510 GPRINT:m_wait:MAX:%6.2lf %s
00511 GPRINT:m_wait:LAST:%6.2lf %s\n
00512 ';
00513     break;
00514 
00515 //     case 'sensor':
00516 //  return '
00517 // -t %title%
00518 // -w %width%
00519 // -h %heigth%
00520 // -s %start%
00521 // -e %end%
00522 // DEF:value=%rrdfile%:value:AVERAGE
00523 // CDEF:nodata=value,UN,0,*

00525 // LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00526 // LINE1:value#00FF00:value
00527 // GPRINT:value:MIN:  %3.2lf %s
00528 // GPRINT:value:AVERAGE:%3.2lf %s
00529 // GPRINT:value:MAX:%3.2lf %s
00530 // GPRINT:value:LAST:%3.2lf %s\n
00531 // ';
00532 
00533     case 'sensor':
00534     return '
00535 -t %title%
00536 -w %width%
00537 -h %heigth%
00538 -s %start%
00539 -e %end%
00540 DEF:value=%rrdfile%:value:AVERAGE
00541 CDEF:nodata=value,UN,0,*
00542 COMMENT:                 min       avg       max       last\n
00543 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00544 AREA:value#00FF00:value
00545 GPRINT:value:MIN:  %3.2lf %s
00546 GPRINT:value:AVERAGE:%3.2lf %s
00547 GPRINT:value:MAX:%3.2lf %s
00548 GPRINT:value:LAST:%3.2lf %s\n
00549 ';
00550     break;
00551 
00552     case 'df':
00553     $show = 'blocks';
00554     if (isset($symon['options']['df'])) {
00555         if ($symon['options']['df'] != 'blocks') {
00556         $show = 'bytes';
00557         }
00558     }
00559 
00560     if ($show == 'blocks') {
00561     return '
00562 -v blocks
00563 -b 1024
00564 -t %title%
00565 -w %width%
00566 -h %heigth%
00567 -s %start%
00568 -e %end%
00569 DEF:blocks=%rrdfile%:blocks:AVERAGE
00570 DEF:free=%rrdfile%:bfree:AVERAGE
00571 DEF:avail=%rrdfile%:bavail:AVERAGE
00572 CDEF:nodata=blocks,UN,0,*
00573 CDEF:Bavail=blocks,free,avail,-,-
00574 CDEF:Bused=blocks,free,-
00575 COMMENT:                  min        avg        max        last\n
00576 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00577 LINE2:blocks#FF0000:total
00578 GPRINT:blocks:MIN:        %4.1lf %s
00579 GPRINT:blocks:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00580 GPRINT:blocks:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00581 GPRINT:blocks:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00582 LINE1:Bavail#55FF55:avail
00583 GPRINT:Bavail:MIN:        %4.1lf %s
00584 GPRINT:Bavail:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00585 GPRINT:Bavail:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00586 GPRINT:Bavail:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00587 AREA:Bused#D0D0FF:used
00588 GPRINT:Bused:MIN:         %4.1lf %s
00589 GPRINT:Bused:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00590 GPRINT:Bused:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00591 GPRINT:Bused:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00592 ';
00593     } else {
00594     return '
00595 -v bytes
00596 -b 1024
00597 -t %title%
00598 -w %width%
00599 -h %heigth%
00600 -s %start%
00601 -e %end%
00602 DEF:b=%rrdfile%:blocks:AVERAGE
00603 DEF:f=%rrdfile%:bfree:AVERAGE
00604 DEF:a=%rrdfile%:bavail:AVERAGE
00605 CDEF:nodata=b,UN,0,*
00606 CDEF:Btotal=b,512,*
00607 CDEF:Bavail=b,f,a,-,-,512,*
00608 CDEF:Bused=b,f,-,512,*
00609 COMMENT:                  min        avg        max        last\n
00610 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00611 LINE2:Btotal#FF0000:total
00612 GPRINT:Btotal:MIN:        %4.1lf %s
00613 GPRINT:Btotal:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00614 GPRINT:Btotal:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00615 GPRINT:Btotal:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00616 LINE1:Bavail#55FF55:avail
00617 GPRINT:Bavail:MIN:        %4.1lf %s
00618 GPRINT:Bavail:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00619 GPRINT:Bavail:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00620 GPRINT:Bavail:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00621 AREA:Bused#D0D0FF:used
00622 GPRINT:Bused:MIN:         %4.1lf %s
00623 GPRINT:Bused:AVERAGE: %4.1lf %s
00624 GPRINT:Bused:MAX: %4.1lf %s
00625 GPRINT:Bused:LAST: %4.1lf %s\n
00626 ';
00627     }
00628 
00629     break;
00630 
00631     default:
00632     return "";
00633     break;
00634     }
00635 }
00636 function get_combined_template($graph_type, $number) {
00637     global $symon;
00638 
00639     switch (strtolower($graph_type)) {
00640     case 'io':
00641     $size = count($symon['color']['io']);
00642     $color = $symon['color']['io'][0];
00643     $ncolor = $symon['color']['io'][$size - 1];
00644     $def= '
00645 -v bytes/s
00646 -t io of %name%
00647 -w %width%
00648 -h %heigth%
00649 -s %start%
00650 -e %end%
00651 DEF:rb0=%rrdfile0%:rbytes:AVERAGE
00652 DEF:wb0=%rrdfile0%:wbytes:AVERAGE
00653 CDEF:nwb0=wb0,-1,*
00654 CDEF:nodata=rb0,UN,0,*
00655 COMMENT:                   min          avg          max          last\n
00656 LINE1:nodata#FF0000
00657 ';
00658     $top = 'AREA:rb0' . $color .':%rrdwhat0%%rrdwhich0% read    
00659 GPRINT:rb0:MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00660 GPRINT:rb0:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00661 GPRINT:rb0:MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00662 GPRINT:rb0:LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00663 ';
00664     $bottom = 'AREA:nwb0'. $ncolor .':%rrdwhat0%%rrdwhich0% write   
00665 GPRINT:wb0:MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00666 GPRINT:wb0:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00667 GPRINT:wb0:MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00668 GPRINT:wb0:LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00669 ';
00670     for ($item = 1; $item < $number; $item++) {
00671         $color = $symon['color']['pfq'][$item % $size];
00672         $ncolor = $symon['color']['pfq'][($size - $item) % $size];
00673 
00674         $def .= 'DEF:rb'. $item. '=%rrdfile'. $item. '%:rbytes:AVERAGE
00675 DEF:wb'. $item. '=%rrdfile'. $item. '%:wbytes:AVERAGE
00676 CDEF:nwb'. $item. '=wb'. $item. ',-1,*
00677 ';
00678         $top .= 'STACK:rb' . $item . $color .':%rrdwhat'. $item .'%%rrdwhich' . $item .'% read    
00679 GPRINT:rb'. $item. ':MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00680 GPRINT:rb'. $item. ':AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00681 GPRINT:rb'. $item. ':MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00682 GPRINT:rb'. $item. ':LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00683 ';
00684         $bottom .= 'STACK:nwb'. $item . $ncolor .':%rrdwhat'. $item. '%%rrdwhich'. $item. '% write   
00685 GPRINT:wb'. $item. ':MIN:%6.2lf %sBps
00686 GPRINT:wb'. $item. ':AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sBps
00687 GPRINT:wb'. $item. ':MAX:%6.2lf %sBps
00688 GPRINT:wb'. $item. ':LAST:%6.2lf %sBps\n
00689 ';
00690     }
00691     return $def . $top . $bottom;
00692     break;
00693 
00694     case "pfq":
00695     $size = count($symon['color']['pfq']);
00696     $color = $symon['color']['pfq'][0];
00697     $ncolor = $symon['color']['pfq'][$size - 1];
00698     $def = '
00699 -v bytes/s
00700 -t pfq of %name%
00701 -w %width%
00702 -h %heigth%
00703 -s %start%
00704 -e %end%
00705 DEF:sb0=%rrdfile0%:sent_bytes:AVERAGE
00706 DEF:db0=%rrdfile0%:drop_bytes:AVERAGE
00707 CDEF:idb0=0,db0,-
00708 CDEF:nodata=sb0,UN,0,*
00709 COMMENT:                min          avg          max         last\n
00710 ';
00711     $top = 'AREA:sb0'. $color. ':%rrdwhat0%%rrdwhich0% sent
00712 GPRINT:sb0:MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00713 GPRINT:sb0:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00714 GPRINT:sb0:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00715 GPRINT:sb0:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00716 ';
00717     $bottom = 'AREA:idb0'. $ncolor. ':%rrdwhat0%%rrdwhich0% drop
00718 GPRINT:db0:MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00719 GPRINT:db0:AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00720 GPRINT:db0:MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00721 GPRINT:db0:LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00722 ';
00723 
00724     for ($item = 1; $item < $number; $item++) {
00725         $color = $symon['color']['pfq'][$item % $size];
00726         $ncolor = $symon['color']['pfq'][($size - $item) % $size];
00727 
00728         $def .= 'DEF:sb'. $item. '=%rrdfile'. $item. '%:sent_bytes:AVERAGE
00729 DEF:db'. $item. '=%rrdfile'. $item. '%:drop_bytes:AVERAGE
00730 CDEF:idb'. $item. '=0,db'. $item .',-
00731 ';
00732 
00733         $top .= 'STACK:sb'. $item . $color .':%rrdwhat'. $item .'%%rrdwhich'. $item. '% sent
00734 GPRINT:sb'. $item .':MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00735 GPRINT:sb'. $item .':AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00736 GPRINT:sb'. $item .':MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00737 GPRINT:sb'. $item .':LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00738 ';
00739         $bottom .= 'STACK:idb'. $item . $ncolor .':%rrdwhat'. $item. '%%rrdwhich'. $item. '% drop
00740 GPRINT:db'. $item .':MIN:%6.2lf %sbps
00741 GPRINT:db'. $item .':AVERAGE:%6.2lf %sbps
00742 GPRINT:db'. $item .':MAX:%6.2lf %sbps
00743 GPRINT:db'. $item .':LAST:%6.2lf %sbps\n
00744 ';
00745     }
00746     return $def . $top . $bottom;
00747     break;
00748     }
00749 }
